name: Details-Damage-Meter

name: CensusPlusClassic

name: Tale

name: Linfo
description: World of Warcraft addon development tool. Displays on any tooltip internal data about it.

name: SLDataText
description: SLDT (Simple Light Data Text) fan update for the popular data broker addon for World of Warcraft
